#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define mod 1000000007
typedef set<string> ss;
typedef vector<int> vs;
typedef map<int,char> msi;
typedef pair<int,int> pa;
typedef long long int ll;
 
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return 1;
	ll ret=power(a,b/2)%7;
	if(b&1)
	return (a*(ret*ret)%7)%7;
	return (ret*ret)%7;
}
 
ll dp[12][2][7],l;
char a[12];
ll solve(ll pos,bool p,ll val)
{
	if(pos==0)
	{
		if(val==0)
		return 1;
		else
		return 0;
	}
	
	if(dp[pos][p][val]==-1)
	{
		dp[pos][p][val]=0;
		for(ll i=0;i<10;i++)
		{
			if(!p && i>(a[l-pos]-'0'))
			continue;
			dp[pos][p][val]+=solve(pos-1,p || i<(a[l-pos]-'0'),(val+power(i,pos))%7);
		}
	}
	return dp[pos][p][val];
}
 
ll i;
int main()
{
	//freopen("i.in", "r", stdin);
  	//freopen("o.out", "w", stdout);
  	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
		cin>>a;
		l=strlen(a);
		cout<<solve(l,0,0)-1<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
